entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
